reviews.review_text: Our cousins recommended this bakery and we went there soon afterward. The friendly owner greeted us and gave us samples to try. We ended up getting 5 different types of pastries. We definitely will return and get all other items.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were over the moon to receive your five-star rating! Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us. Your support means the world to us, and were excited to have the opportunity to continue exceeding your expectations in the future.

reviews.review_text: Been curious about this bakery for quite some time now and I took the chance to pass by after doing my errands this afternoon - AND IM GLAD I DID! I got to meet the owner, Kamo himself. Such a nice guy! He immediately knew that it was my first time and he gave a me a piece of their Baklava for free AND I LOVED IT! It was my first time and Ive only seen baklavas on TV.   It was so good! Ive had my eyes fixed on their pistachio cookies and bought a couple to take home. It was indeed a positive experience for me! Ill definitely be back to try the rest of their selections! If I could give 6 stars here, I would! EDIT: Added pictures on the review
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery.

reviews.review_text: Went for the first time and the owner was SUPER friendly and sweet! He let gave us multiple free samples so we could see what he liked, and everything tasted amazing!! The paklava was super crispy and full of flavor. Highly recommend this bakery
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about Kamo bakery products ! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: Pros: Extremely friendly staff. Very welcoming and helpful. Sweet items have a great balanced mixture of nuts and pastry. The taste of nuts in their items is very prevalent, and not overshadowed by sweetness. Suitable for usual Asian tastes. Additional area with difficult to find pantry items. Cash and credit/debit cards accepted. Accessible by public transit. Parking available in the back of the bakery. Cons: Mostly for pick up. No seating area. *** Can t wait to try their breads and savoury items.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery

reviews.review_text: Professional, friendly atmosphere. Checked the place for the first time yesterday and met the owner. Very generous and friendly person. I have tried some baklava, kenafa and pastry with dates. It is delicious, lightly sweetened as I prefer. There a variety of flavours and options to choose from. I had a mix box. In addition, the bread is fresh and tasty. It will go well with cheese either breakfast or dinner. My taste buds asked for more!! Highly recommended to try Kamo Bakery!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about Kamo bakery products ! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: The best baclava in the city hands down. My favourite bakery to get these delectable treats! Even my Vietnamese mom who s the pickiest eater in the world loves them. The royal baklavas are pricier but the artistry is worth it if you re aiming to impress. The pistachio and walnut baklavas taste just as good though! The pistachio cookies are also delicious. They also have parking in the back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Angela, Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5-star review of Kamo Bakery! Your feedback is incredibly valuable to us, and were overjoyed to learn that you had such a positive experience at our establishment. We are dedicated to creating a warm and inviting environment for our customers, and were thrilled that we were able to make your visit enjoyable. We cant wait to have the opportunity to serve you again, and if theres anything we can do to make your next visit even better, please dont hesitate to let us know.

reviews.review_text: Best baklava Ive ever had - Kamo Bakery doesnt soak their baklava in syrup so it stays light, crisp and not too sweet and is filled with good quality nuts. Also dont sleep on the pistachio cookies - they taste like pistachio Nutella and melt in your mouth when consumed with your choice of milk. The owner is also super friendly, happy to explain what the different types of baklava are and proud of his baked goods. Definitely makes me happy to support and glad theyre not too far away so I can drop by a sweet treat.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We truly appreciate your continuous support and trust in us. Your 5-star review brightens our day and serves as a constant reminder of why we love what we do. We ll continue striving to provide exceptional products, services and outstanding customer care to make every interaction with us remarkable.

reviews.review_text: Ordered in Uber Eats, wanted to get 1lb of mixed baklava so called to ask if that is possible to do so as Uber didn t show 50/50 option. Super nice and friendly man (thank You!!) said he can make a box of mixed baklava, and that he will also put a small gift to try - Royal Paklava - it was soooo good, a lot of flavourful filling, not too sweet, it is PERFECT Walnut & Pistachio Baklavas also well balanced in flavors and structure, the top is perfectly crispy, great filling, soft inside, sweetness level is perfect for me (most baklavas I tried in Vancouver before were super sweet and had less filling so couldn t even notice nuts flavour). Definitely recommend to try! :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Anastasia! Thank you for the fantastic review! We put a lot of effort into making our products. The Royal Paklava is new product we just made it, so we are thrilled to hear that you are enjoying it.

reviews.review_text: We are from a different city and found this hidden gem while waiting to meet up with family. The owner is so super sweet! Because it was our first time there, he gave us a Paklava to try. For my partner who never had one before, he said it was love at first taste. The Paklava isnt super sweet or super greasy like some Ive had before.  I highly recommend going  if youve never tried or if youre visiting Vancouver. We know this is the one place well go everytime we visit.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our store! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: I thought i didn t really like baklava until i tried it here. So delicious! We bought a pound as soon as we tried one. The owner was really friendly and helpful too! Will go back 100%
reviews.response_from_owner_text: ank you so much for the 5-star review! We are thrilled to hear that you are enjoying our product&service and appreciate your feedback. Keep it coming!

reviews.review_text: My son and I went to this lovely Kurdish bakery after hearing the rave reviews from a friend. Their baklava is phenomenal. The best Ive ever had. Less sweet than other recipes. Everything was very fresh and made from high quality ingredients. The owner and employees are very warm and welcoming, so this is a very easy 5 stars! We will definitely be back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review. The team at Kamo Bakery  is thrilled you re happy with your recent store visit.

reviews.review_text: This is the best Middle Eastern bakery in Vancouver. Very delicious and authentic. Their baklava and klachia are not that sweet. Very consistent taste and so fresh. Friendly customer service. I highly recommend this bakery.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your experience.

reviews.review_text: The best baklava I ever had.  Love the pistachio one!  Its not too sweet - just sweet enough and flaky with a beautiful buttery flavor.  I find baklavas at other places too sweet but the ones here are perfect.  Very friendly and welcoming owner.  Pay by weight and I find it very affordable.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about Kamo bakery products ! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: I discovered Kamo bakery while I was walking to an appointment. I immediately walked in to check it out. The man at the counter was very helpful and kind. Ive had Baklava before and they sell something similar called, Paklava. I was hesitant to try it because the baklava I had was sticky, chewy and way too sweet. He said, ours is different. Im so glad I tried it. It was absolutely delicious. It was crispy, buttery and not cloyingly sweet. Delicious!!! I ended up buying 6 pieces that day. They also had pomegranate molasses. I bought a bottle of that too. I cant wait until they have Knafeh. He said they will have it soon. EDIT: I went to this bakery again and the service is consistently friendly and welcoming. I love their Walnut Paklava. I bought a pound of it this time. I am also in love with their breads and orange cookies.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at Kamo Bakery. We take pride in knowing our customers are happy with their store experience.

reviews.review_text: Truly the best paklava I have ever had! Owner was incredibly kind and really passionate about his products. I can t recommend this place enough. Everything was not too sweet, and just the right balance of flavour and crispiness. I will absolutely be returning!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about Kamo bakery products ! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: The best baklava i ve ever had!! Top quality and the bakery owners are Angels   the food exudes Love.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5-star review. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.

reviews.review_text: I just visited this place and I gotta say it s a hidden gem! I got to try their baklavas very tasty and fresh, not super sweet. Their collection of breads is very interesting, I got the Samoon bread, so excited to try it. I spoke with a very friendly guy and got to try their baklavas! I m very excited to try these UPDATED REVIEW: Keep coming back for their specialty breads! They are so good for quick breakfast and you can stuff them easily with anything you want!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you.

reviews.review_text: Fantastic bakery, even walking in the door you are treated to the wonderful smells. The pastries are so delicious! The baklava and labzina are like nothing Ive tasted before. The prices are fair and the service exceptional. 10 stars if I could.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words! Were thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our bakery treats. We strive to provide delicious baked goods and excellent service. Looking forward to serving you again soon at Kamo Bakery!

reviews.review_text: Must try bakery (and catering)! I felt like I was getting a five star private wine tasting experience except its dessert. Didnt think paklavas could taste unique from other baklavas. Best one Ive tasted, not dry at all. Top notch service. More people need to know about this place. Cant say enough great things. Highly recommend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review. The team at Kamo Bakery  is thrilled you re happy with your recent store visit.

reviews.review_text: Amazing bakery with extra friendly service. All the 5 star reviews are right: A MUST try when you are in the neighbourhood. We brought several pastries, they are all delicious. My mom tried the Samoom. She loved it. We came on a Monday at 5:30pm. There is free parking right in front of the store. PLUS their pastries are by weight instead of per piece. Overall, I love this bakery & will come again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our customers happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing customers like you. Thanks again, and we hope to serve you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Well I have to say Kamo Bakery lives up to all its 5   reviews on Google! As everyone has said the owners are very kind and welcoming. I tried the Paklava (? I think that s the name), a walnut cake and the date cakes. All were absolutely delicious and these singles in the photos are all that survived the 5minute walk home. Also picked up a big bag of Samoon bread which is also great. Very happy to have Kamo in the neighborhood!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Appreciated, thank you very much.

reviews.review_text: Great gem of a bakery we found while walking on Victoria Drive. The owner is very friendly and takes pride in his products. We had pistachio and walnut baklava. Very balanced between the sweet  filling and flaky pastry. Well done!! Get there early as this place is popular.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our customers happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing customers like you. Thanks again, and we hope to serve you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Everything the other review says are right! The owner is definitely the sweetest thing in the shop as all their pastries are made with low sugar. After hearing its my first time there, the owner was so enthusiastic to introduce to me what they have and giving me a couple of samples to try. It was a very heart warming gesture. First the baklavas, the sweetness is only about 1/2 or less than the other baklavas out there, I can finally taste the true taste of the baklavas without filling my mouth with syrup. My husband absolutely loves it. My absolute favorites in the shop is the sesame cake and the dates pastry. Sesame cake tastes really fragrant and addictive. You dont get sick and tired of the taste at all. The texture is more like a cookie. The date pastry is quite different from the other places Ive tried and definitely my second choice from the shop. The orange chocolate cookie is another must have if you are a chocolate person. Its got such a strong dark bitter chocolate taste to it youll feel like youre eating dark chocolate itself. The texture was also really good. It has a combination of cookies and brownies texture making it nice and moist but still crunchy. Everything is priced by weight (baklava costs more). I think on average, each pc will cost around $1. This place is a bit out of my way, but with this quality, Im ok to make a trip there more often now
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Lucy, Thank you for your kind words. We are happy that you liked our products as they are all low suger, and we are making them every day, so they will be fresh. We will be more than happy to see you again :) Thanks, Kamo

reviews.review_text: Owner is really friendly and kind! The breads, sesame cookies, and baklava were delicious. Probably the best baklava I ve had - crispy, flakey, and not too sweet. My favourite was the pistachio one. Definitely recommend coming by here!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, appreciated.

reviews.review_text: The Paklawa is really good here! Owner is very friendly and recommended a few items for me to try. I will definitely come back! Great Bakery.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at Kamo Bakery. We take pride in knowing our customers are happy with their store experience.

reviews.review_text: We came because the reviews for this place has been amazing. Well we re so glad we checked this bakery out! The baklava was so so good!!! We enjoy the sesame cake too. We regretted only getting a few baklava (we had to fight to get the last piece), but we for sure will return for more. We got some freebies from the sweetest kindest owner too. So happy that they open in our neighborhood! Thank you, Kamo Bakery
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our customers happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing customers like you. Thanks again, and we hope to serve you again soon.

reviews.review_text: The absolute best Middle-Eastern / Mediterranean Bakery .Ever!!! This little gem does not disappoint in fact you won t find more authentic-breads or pastries anywhere in western Canada. No cheap ingredients at Kamo Baker and you can taste the quality! Once you try it you ll refuse to settle for anything less  I live 4 hours away and we always stock up every-time we are in town. #1 Baklava #1 Date filled cookies and #1 tandoori Bread (Saj). always fresh even when I freeze and thaw!!! Absolutely love this place!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: This review made our day!. We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us.

reviews.review_text: Check out this family owned place for an authentic Middle Eastern Experience! Im legitimately impressed at how welcoming the owner is and passionate about sharing his recipes with the rest of the world. Extremely delicious handcrafted kwlaicha. Their Baklava had a unique taste, Its sweet but not overly sweet like other places Would definitely recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our customers happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing customers like you. Thanks again, and we hope to serve you again soon.

reviews.review_text: I would love to give more than 5 stars to this amazing bakery! It was such a joy to go to Kamo bakery. The fresh smell, great quality, and the cleanliness makes you visit more and more! What made me be so impressed is the wonderful woman who works hardly behind the scenes to make all the delicious pastry and sweets! Highly recommended
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much.

reviews.review_text: Super tasty Middle Eastern sweet! Totally charmed by the desserts layers and fragrance, and would definitely come back for more!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery

reviews.review_text: The owner was too good.. he patiently explained each of the items he had on display and even gave me a sample to taste.. The baklavas are very tasty .. I got the pistachio, walnuts, and royal bakalavas. It is hard to choose a favourite. Its very crispy on the outside.. not too sweet or greasy. I will try their cookies next time.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us. We hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: A sweet gem of a spot. The sesame bread is lovely dipped in olive oil and my kids gobble it up! The baklava is HEAVENLY. Best of all, the welcome is always warm and the owner even sent a little gift with my last order. WONDERFUL PLACE.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We really appreciate you taking the time to share your rating with us. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Best Paklava in Vancouver! It is not very sweet, so for me, it has perfect sweetness level with very strong pistachio flavor,very tasty. And you guys have to try their Turkish yogurt, its very thick and creamy and less sour than Greek yogurt, first time experience with Turkish yogurt and I love it. Itll be good for either breakfast or salad sauce. This brilliant family business opened two months ago, the owner is super friendly and nice. Will definitely come back, thank you
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much.

reviews.review_text: Best bread in town! Especially if you have a sensitive stomach, rest assured that the owner uses quality products and no added preservatives. Im in love with their sandwich bread and all their sweets! Their Baklava is truly authentic and delicious, always fresh.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our store! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience

reviews.review_text: What a lovely people! What an amazing baklava! We loved their Pistachio baklavas, and some other stuffs. We don t have any bakery like them to bake a flat bread nearby! I was always going all the way to North Van to buy it fresh! But that s great when I found you guys
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5-star review. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.

reviews.review_text: Since I am not too familar with Middle East pasties, I asked the owner to pick out a sample pack for me.  While doing so, he gave me a few to try to make sure I liked them.  The owner is super friendly and helpful. The pastries in the pack were all surperb.  Kamo is now one of my favorites bakeries in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery.

reviews.review_text: The authentic pastries here will take you to Middle East. The owners are exceptionally kind and humble who know the art of baking traditional sweets. Not pictured but the baklava is one of the best ones I ve had in Lower Mainland. 11/10
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, appreciated.

reviews.review_text: Im in love with the quality of their products, everything is super authentic and delicious, best Samoon and Baklava! Also, when you visit them, they make you feel like home, very warm, kind and welcoming!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about Kamo bakery products ! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: I love their baklava. its not oily and always tastes fresh and delicious even if you eat it after a week you still feel the fresh richness of the ingredients.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your positive feedback on our bakery! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our baked goods and had a delightful experience. It means the world to us, and we deeply appreciate your kind words and support. We cant wait to serve you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Highly recommended!!! What sets this gem apart is its commitment to using only the finest, most authentic ingredients, giving every item a distinct and genuine flavor.  Their Pistachio and Walnut Baklawas, alongside the irresistible Kulicha, exude a tantalizing blend of honey and organic butter, unveiling a taste that is simply unparalleled. Since my first encounter with their treats a few months ago, I find myself unable to satisfy my cravings anywhere else. Kamos devotion and unwavering integrity to his craft truly sets this bakery apart. Kamo definitely deserves all the praise for his honesty and integrity in his work.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery.

reviews.review_text: Kamo Bakery is wonderful, I love it as baglava lover, taste is amazing. However it is sweet in is not to much sweet and most of them all free sugar. My friend as a debate and she can not eat any sweet but from Kamo Bakery she can eat and enjoy sweet. Kamo Bakery is it a must go and eat place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about Kamo bakery products ! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: Bought piping hot, absolutely delicious samoon bread this morning & the kind attentive owner surprised me with a piece of delectable pistachio baklava :) ... Yes ! on the house. I almost wolfed it down in my car it was simply divine.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are incredibly grateful that you took the time out to leave us a 5-Star review. Thanks

reviews.review_text: Have to to give it a try... The best of the best Bakalava in Vancouver!! The owner is very sweet too!!! Pls to come and have a taste of heaven!!!^-^!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us feedback.

reviews.review_text: Probably one of the best experience Ive ever had. Walked by on my lunch break and by chance decided to go in. The service is amazing, the owner is super nice, and the food is another level. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: hank you so much for your five-star review! Were thrilled to hear about your amazing experience and cant wait to welcome you back soon.

reviews.review_text: this place is a gem!! The owner is super pleasant and the pastry selection is awesome. the baklavas and other cookies are splendid. come pay a visit if you crave for some quality desserts.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our customers happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing customers like you. Thanks again, and we hope to serve you again soon.

reviews.review_text: I like that they open for business early. Looks like they prep and bake in house. Was the perfect spot to pick up birthday sweets for the guys at work. I ordered the pistachio and walnut Baklavas and they were delicious Need to go back and try the rest of their menu.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for taking the time to leave us a fantastic review and 5-star rating   its much appreciated!

reviews.review_text: The best pistachio baklava in Canada. So fresh, crispy & flaky, nutty and not too sweet. The family that owns and operates the bakery is so nice.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you.

reviews.review_text: Excellent middle eastern pastries and sweets. Like many others have stated here, their baklava is delicious and not overly sweet. Lovely people behind the counter. This is the definition of a true local gem.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our store! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: Just dropped by as I was in the area and was pleasantly surprised! Kamo served me and helped me pick out a few things and was so kind! The Paklavas were amazing - not too sweet and perfectly light and crispy. Im already planning my next trip back to try some new things!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our store! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: My favourite place to get baklavas! Not too sweet and every layer is crispy. The people working here are very nice too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for this great 5-star review. We really appreciate your business and helping to share the word about Kamo Bakery.

reviews.review_text: Wonderful addition to Victoria Drive! Very friendly staff, let us try samples and they were all so good. Pastries were flaky, light, and not too sweet
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your positive feedback on our bakery! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our baked goods and had a delightful experience. It means the world to us, and we deeply appreciate your kind words and support. We cant wait to serve you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Such a lovely bakery with the best baklava in town! I first discovered the bakery out of curiosity but I always come back for the great & friendly service whenever I m in the neighbourhood <3
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery.

reviews.review_text: It was the most delicious Baklava that I ve tried. The kind owner offered us some freebies, and we were excited about its taste. It has no oil and it doesn t make you feel bad. It s sweetness is at the best level. It s texture is the most satisfying aspect I believe. The quality of pistachio is great, no bad smell showing its freshness. We will regularly buy. And also the kind and high energy owner    thanks for being here
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our customers happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing customers like you. Thanks again, and we are looking forward see you again.

reviews.review_text: Excellent! The baklava was not too sweet. Lots of variations and great selection of bread as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about Kamo bakery products ! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: very friendly guy at the front. i bought a medium box of a few things, loved all of them! i will try and return another day :) forgot to take a picture earlier but theyre also very cute.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. Were here for you anytime.

reviews.review_text: The baklava and labzina are awesome!  Not too sweet and just right!  Their labzina has become my goto fix for sesame cravings.  Their baklava has awesome flaky pastry texture with just the right amount of sweetness. The guy also recommended the samoon bread.  Will try that on my next BBQ plan.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jim, Were extremely happy that you had a positive experience, and were grateful for your feedback

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and very friendly staff! I bought a pound of baklava and a pound of shakirlama for a party, and it was all delicious. Pistachio baklava especially recommended!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5-star review. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.

reviews.review_text: Biji Kurdish is an exquisite bakery and patisserie, the quest for genuine Kurdish bakeries hailing from the heartland of Kurdistan led me far and wide, until the elation of discovering your establishment! Kamo, the proprietor, exudes an unparalleled amiability and charm, traits that reverberate throughout the entire family. Our delectable authentic Samoon and Kulera leave me enraptured, and the Paqlawa surpasses all expectations, tantalizing the taste buds to no end. What sets this establishment apart is the impeccable hygiene standards meticulously adhered to. One can rest assured that every delicacy is crafted with unwavering passion, employing cherished homemade recipes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Slaw kak Rand, again biji Kurd! On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our store! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: A day has passed since I visited this bakery on a whim and I still feel a bit giddy from my visit. The owner s kindness and genuine warmth in wanting to share his delectable creations was such a treat to discover on a grey February day. But the pastries, you ask? The pistachio baklava is THE best (if you re the kind of person who finds finds the sticky drenched type to be too sickly sweet, you will love it too) and the pistachio cookies oh my. I got a boxed assortment of things that caught my eye, and they have all been deliciously different from other pastries in Vancouver. Stop by for a visit, you won t be sorry!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our store! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE with their baklava and shortbread cookies! The owners are super sweet and welcoming. Their baklava s are flaky crisp, buttery and not too over powering with sweet syrup compared to some of the other ones I ve tried at other stores. It s perfect   . Every person I have brought these to have shared the same feedback. My guilty pleasure
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for this great 5-star review. We really appreciate your business and helping to share the word about Kamo Bakery

reviews.review_text: Best baclava ever!! The owner is very polite and sweet. Gave me a Baclava to try before buying it. That was very nice of him. This is the best place for Baclavas!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about Kamo bakery products ! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience

reviews.review_text: I was passing by the street and just saw the picture of baklava outside. Honestly I thought I would be regular full of syrup baklava that I tasted from turkey however, this one was different. It was not dipped into the syrup so I can not be seen as original baklava, but it was amazing that even thought its not original or sweet. It has an insane amount of flavour of pistachio and walnut. Moreover, the owner of this place is so kind and have a good energy that I wanted to go again! MUST TRY PISTACHIO BAKLAVA!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our customers happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing customers like you. Thanks again, and we hope to serve you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Pistachio Baklawa, Pistachio Cookies and Labzina are the must try items at this place. We have been there twice and i really appreciate their customer service. These are desserts which are really flavourful with the nuts that go in with very little sugar in them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery.

reviews.review_text: I am their regular customer, a great owner, their oven bread is the best, nice and fresh snacks, and one of the best if not the best baklava. I particularly enjoy their kulicha (date cookies) they are the best of snacks if you go there look for them
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at Kamo Bakery. We take pride in knowing our customers are happy with their store experience.

reviews.review_text: Went there this evening 10 mins before closing time with my group of friends. Owner is super friendly and also gave us first timers samples. Delicious goodies definitely coming back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5-star review. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.

reviews.review_text: Super friendly owner and genuine. We really enjoyed the pastries and they weren t too sweet!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re glad that you enjoyed your Paklava and pastry. Thansk

reviews.review_text: Very friendly service and delicious baked goods. My favourite was the baklava - they were perfectly sweet and crisp.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review, appreciated.

reviews.review_text: Very tasty crispy fresh Baklava, and an amazing delicious homemade pistachio cookie. Great friendly customer service. You should try it for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a 5 star rating - its much appreciated.

reviews.review_text: Excellent bakery shop which uses good ingredients without OVER sweetness. May seem pricey but tastes is awesome. (Still sweet) Lower sugar without any impact on the taste which is excellent. You should try Kamo bakery if you have not. Owner is very nice too and he is happy to see customers enjoying his bakery. (That s called passion!)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you.

reviews.review_text: Today, I visited Kamo Bakery and was blown away by the delicious baklavas and the warm hospitality. Kamo himself was so nice and friendly, and he even gave us free baklavas to try! The baklava, the bread, and the cookie we purchased were all absolutely delicious - not too sweet, but full of flavor and perfectly baked. Overall, I highly recommend Kamo Bakery for anyone looking for a taste of authentic, high-quality baked goods and friendly service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for choosing us! We are overjoyed to read your 5-star review! Thank you for your kind words and for supporting our product and service.

reviews.review_text: I would give 10 stars to this bakery. This is the best bakery in Vancouver!! Our family enjoyed the paklava, it was not too sweet and very good! I personally loved pistachio shakirlama which is the new menu just came out today. Dont miss out!!! Also the customer service was outstanding as well, he was so friendly and everything was good. I highly recommend this place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you.

reviews.review_text: Reasonably priced delicious baked goods and genuinely wonderful people who own this bakery, would highly recommend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your glowing 5-star review of Kamo Bakery! Your kind words truly brighten our day and motivate us to continue delivering exceptional service and delectable baked goods.

reviews.review_text: The pistachio baklava are so delicious and I dont like baklava!  The owner is so sweet and friendly.  As others have posted he lets you try everything at no charge.  Everything is delicious. So glad theyre in the neighbourhood - a very nice welcome from all the other Asian bakeries.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the awesome review,BM Wong! We work hard to meet expectations like yours

reviews.review_text: An amazing bakery ran by a super kind gentleman. The pistachio baklava and their bread/pita are absolutely delicious; it was the best baklava I ve ever had. I will say that the other pastries may not be for everyone, or at least an acquired taste. The owner was super kind and gave me some samples of some of the other baked goods. Unfortunately I found them dry and a bit bland, but I m sure plenty of others love them.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much.

reviews.review_text: I had a fantastic time at Kamo a Persian Middle Eastern Bakery in town. The baked goods were incredibly fresh and authentic, and I particularly enjoyed the Persian flat bread, sesame bread, baklava, and assorted cookies. The owner was very friendly and provided excellent customer service, which made my visit even more enjoyable. Overall, I highly recommend this bakery to anyone looking for an authentic and delicious Middle Eastern treats.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery.

reviews.review_text: This place definitely deserves another 5-star rating!  Great owner and great selection of goods!  Cant go wrong with anything pistachio.   The baklava here is definitely not as sweet as other places and the pastry is nice and crispy.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery.

reviews.review_text: We promised to write a review when we visited, so here it is. We had seen the sign up for several months and were curious to know what would be opening in this unprepossessing space on the drive. We happened to walk by the other day and they were open, so we ventured in. Its a tiny bakery run by some lovely and friendly Syrians, with a selection of fresh Syrian breads and baklava. We asked some questions, which were answered enthusuastically and we bought a bag of their freshly baked flatbreads (Samoon) and an assortment of their pastries. They also gave us a small bag of bonus bread. It was their opening day, which can sometimes mean things go wrong. Not here! The flatbreads were great. Light and airy - perfect with falafels or charcuterie - whatever you like. The star of the show, however, is the pastries. The baklava is light, crisp, fresh and not too sweet or drowned in syrup, which is all too common, especially at Persian bakeries. There were also the most delicious sesame squares and date pastries. Try them all - nothing was disappointing. If they keep this standard up, they deserve to be very successful. They have opened in a difficult spot, but they deserve support and we will return there next time we are on Victoria Drive. Grab some pastries and have them with some good coffee. Heaven!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot

reviews.review_text: Friendly owner, free samples, and extremely reasonable prices.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us. We hope to see you again soon

reviews.review_text: Came across this bakery with a friend while walking along Victoria Drive, and Im so glad we went in! The customer service was amazing, and we were able to sample a couple of pastries before buying. I ended up getting some pistachio baklava along with some shakirlama which were delicious, Ill definitely be coming back! (:
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Your review made our day! Our whole team works very hard to keep our customers happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing customers like you. Thanks again, and we hope to serve you again soon.

reviews.review_text: The baklavas are seriously delicious! Ive never been a big fan of baklava because of the sweetness and, unfortunately, sometimes greasiness. Seeing so many excellent reviews of Kamos baklavas, I was actually excited to try it for myself. I was not disappointed. We got both types, the walnut and the pistachio. They are both amazing--just the right amount of sweetness and not greasy at all! Its so incredibly well done, flaky and buttery--these baklavas are not pastries they are art! We loved them so much the next day my husband ordered some to bring to work to share. Everybody loved them. The baklavas are so spectacular I almost forgot to mention their other sweets and the owner. The owner--Ive got to ask for his name next time--is super nice. As a first timer in the bakery, he offered to let us try anything were interested. We ended up trying almost everything and buying a whole bunch of different sweets. In total we got 12 baklavas and a small box of assorted cookies. We finished them in 3 days, just the two of us! They are lethal because you dont feel guilty eating them at all. Its a joy to discover small neighbourhood gems like Kamo. It makes you appreciate the little things in life that much more.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We would not be able to grow and develop without feedback like yours, Susie Yang. We are thrilled you had a great experience with us and hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: The best baklava! Not too sweet and so flaky. Kamo (the owner) is also so lovely. I always feel really welcomed when going into the bakery. I highly recommend everything!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review and five stars rating . We count ourselves lucky for customers like you.

reviews.review_text: You might not notice it, the shop is small and not fancy at all, but the goods are great! Baklava are definitely my favourite. Only slightly sweetened, you can enjoy the crispy pistachio and walnut flavours without ending with greasy fingers. Plus the service is really nice.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Many thanks for the 5-star rating. If there s anything we can do to improve our offering, please let us know!

reviews.review_text: The pistachio cookies are great -- and of course the baklava. But the cookies are an original recipe!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for giving us your take on how we are doing. Were glad that customers like you are having a great experience at Kamo bakery.

reviews.review_text: Owner was very friendly and let us sample each of the items on showcase. The Baklava is our favorite, everything else was also great and not too sweet, so you can really eat a lot of them. My mom thinks this is the best bakery in the area and want to recommend this to all her friends.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

reviews.review_text: We found this little gem on Victoria Drive and we loved it. The owner is very friendly, knowledgeable and generous. He gave us many samples to try.  It was delicious. The breads were very fresh and the owner recommended to us how to eat them. We were delighted but this bakery. Definitely will come back to this family business. Loved it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the awesome review, Mona! We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we re happy to hear we hit the mark for you. Come back and see us soon.

reviews.review_text: I have been fortunate enough to try their baked goods a couple of times and me, my family, my friends and my coworkers are all amazed at how incredible everything is. On top of that my experiences with the KAMO BAKERY staff have been incredible as well. Nothing but positive experiences from me and everyone I know. Love the genuine love and care that exudes from everything I ve seen and interacted with from Kamo Bakery. SERVES: I was never see any bakery served costumers well like Kamo Bakery FOOD: I ordered the Nan and Baklava Both were %100 warm, fresh, delicious, and sweet. The knot was one of the best baked goods I ve had in my life. STAFF: Kamo Bakery is a family bakery! Everyone knows the important point for the successfully bakary, restaurant and all the businesses in the world is (Family Staff) CLEAN: %100 clean and healthy PRICE: Not outrageous. Worth it. RECOMMEND: Without a doubt. I ll be returning. EAND: Im just saying I MISSING CAMO BAKERY....
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Goran, Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. Were here for you anytime.

reviews.review_text: As just moved to the neighborhood,  I was just passing Victoria Dr to London Drugs on feet and the bakery caught my eye, I entered out of curiosity, a kind gentleman offered me one baklava I said I cant eat sweet and kept offering saying it wasnt as sweet as others I said no again respectfully, then he offered me a sesame o-ring like pastry, I couldnt refuse this time, and started eating, that was delicious and crispy! With least amount of sugar,  I grabbed a pound of mixed ones. I am glad I did that. My wife really likes the stuffed pastry with walnut and dates. Small shop but a jewl, and such a nice owner, would definitely recommend and come back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you.

reviews.review_text: Went to this shop because I ve been seeing great reviews. Owner was very accomodating and kind he even gave me a free taste of their best seller baklava. I immediately loved the pistachio baklava and ordered some. Worth the try and will definitely go back for their other pastries.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were really grateful and appreciate you taking the time to share your rating with us.

reviews.review_text: First time I see authentic Middle Eastern bakery in Vancouver! the owner very respectful, great person! Baklava is the best!  I will definitely come back. Thank you for providing exceptional tasty bakery to us!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sllaw Kak Sherwan! Thank you so much for your 5-star review! We will share this with the store team to let them know to keep up the amazing work.

reviews.review_text: Great bakery. Customer service was great and helpful. I had never tried these kinds of baked goods before, and I was pleasantly surprised. They were fresh and of good quality. I would especially recommend anything with pistachio in it.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at Kamo Bakery. We take pride in knowing our customers are happy with their store experience.

reviews.review_text: The baklava, the other confectionaries and pastries are simply out of this word!   My sons really enjoy the fresh flatbreads that are freshly baked as well. You just have to try them for yourself. The Kamo bakery owners themselves are very welcoming and make you feel you feel really taken care of.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at Kamo Bakery. We take pride in knowing our customers are happy with their store experience.

reviews.review_text: The best baklava I ve ever had! So fresh, so crispy, soooo delicious. And a bonus that the owner is incredibly kind.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. Were here for you anytime.

reviews.review_text: One of the best Kurdish bakeries in Vancouver, super clean and very healthy sweets. If you cant travel to the middle east you should definitely visit Kamo bakery to taste the real sweets and bread of middle east. Thank you for your amazing service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Sillaw Kak Dana. On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our store! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: All these positive reviews are well deserved. We got fresh samoon that we will definitely be going back for. Absolutely delicious baklava. Such a kind and friendly man, too!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you.

reviews.review_text: Went to this bakery on their opening day and have been going back everyday since. Great selections of sweet treats, the sugar free options were extremely delicious as well. Definitely try the Baklava, it was just prefect, not too sweet or syrupy. Its a family run business which is another reason to support them!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Appreciated

reviews.review_text: This bakery is making the best baklava in Vancouver. Nowhere else comes close. Always fresh, never too sweet, light and flaky. The owner is also a delight! He is super cheerful and always encouraging you to sample something new.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, appreciated.

reviews.review_text: Went to this new little bakery and got some of everything. Absolutely delicious. The baklava is the best Ive ever had, and their breads are so yummy. The people are super nice. Go check it out!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much.

reviews.review_text: Delicious paklavas (pistachios and walnuts), pistachio cookies and labzina! The owner was very friendly and let us sample a paklava. Highly recommend!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your review. We count ourselves lucky for customers like you.

reviews.review_text: i was in this morning and the young man who served me was so gracious and polite!  i bought the paklava and kulicha...all i can say is what a treat it was!  i will be coming back tomorrow morning to buy more to share with friends and spreading the word of your wonderful bakery!  thank you for sharing your wonderful culture of sweets to us!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: On behalf us all of us at Kamo Bakery, I would like to thank you for sharing this great review about our store! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience.

reviews.review_text: The area has a lot of Chinese bakeries who basically make and sell the same stuff.  Its nice to have something completely different in the area.  Owner is really nice and friendly.  The Baklava are great for noobs who havent tried pastries from this part of the world.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much, appreciated.
